name: Stichting EU-Health Property Network
goal: Our aim is to promote better standards and more effective investment in, and management of, health property throughout the EU, by using our network capability to enable members to pool and share knowledge, and to keep pace with leading edge developments in this central dimension of health care.
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Policies and initiatives concerning health system development, particularly those which may affect the physical infrastructure of healthcare systems and organisations, including the planning, design, construction and financing of all kinds of healthcare buildings and technologies.
